## Description

The **Schedule Triggers** component provides a standard schedule trigger that allows integrations to be executed on a recurring schedule.

## Triggers

<div id="schedule" />

### Schedule

Executes an Integration on a recurring schedule | <small><b>key: schedule</b></small>

<ComponentInputsTable inputs={[]} />

For more information on the schedule trigger, see the [integration triggers](integration-triggers.mdx#scheduled-triggers) article.
